LanguageData.Warg.label: warg
LanguageData.Warg.description: Lihaksikas sudentapainen olio. Tiedemiehet sanovat, että wargit ovat armeijan käyttöön väkiluvun hillitsemiseen luotujen eläinten jälkeläisiä. Taikauskoiset pitävät niitä vihaisen jumalan työkaluna.
LanguageData.Warg_Leather.label: wargin nahkaa
LanguageData.Warg_Meat.label: wargin lihaa
LanguageData.Warg_Corpse.label: wargin ruumis
LanguageData.WolfTimber.label: timber wolf
LanguageData.WolfTimber.description: A rugged predator long feared by many ancient Earth cultures. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.WolfTimber_Leather.label: timber wolfskin
LanguageData.WolfTimber_Meat.label: wolfmeat
LanguageData.WolfTimber_Corpse.label: timber wolf corpse
LanguageData.WolfArctic.label: arctic wolf
LanguageData.WolfArctic.description: An arctic variant of the old Earth wolf. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.WolfArctic_Leather.label: arctic wolfskin
LanguageData.WolfArctic_Corpse.label: arctic wolf corpse
LanguageData.FoxFennec.label: fennec fox
LanguageData.FoxFennec.description: A small fox originally from the northern part of Earth's Africa continent. It hunts small creatures and has very large ears.
LanguageData.FoxFennec_Leather.label: fennec foxskin
LanguageData.FoxFennec_Meat.label: foxmeat
LanguageData.FoxFennec_Corpse.label: fennec fox corpse
LanguageData.FoxRed.label: red fox
LanguageData.FoxRed.description: A small solitary canine evolved for hunting small prey in temperate climates.
LanguageData.FoxRed_Leather.label: red foxskin
LanguageData.FoxRed_Corpse.label: red fox corpse
LanguageData.FoxArctic.label: arctic fox
LanguageData.FoxArctic.description: A small predator adapted for the far north. It usually hunts small game like mice and voles, sometimes burrowing through a meter of snow to reach its prey.
LanguageData.FoxArctic_Leather.label: arctic foxskin
LanguageData.FoxArctic_Corpse.label: arctic fox corpse
